name: nativescript-ngx-slides
description: NativeScript + Angular version of the slides

scripts.demo.ios: ngc && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: ngc && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && tns run android
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && tns plugin add ../src

author: Josh Sommer <joshdsommer@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/_JoshSommer)
